titleInfo.title: Jimmie Rodgers - Victor 23736 dub (In The Hills Of Tennessee) / Victor 23564 dub (I'm Lonesome Too, excerpt)

mods.abstract: Jimmie Rodgers' In The Hills Of Tennessee followed by an excerpt from I'm Lonesome Too, likely dubs from the 78 releases Victor 23736 and Victor 23564, respectively.
